    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      This method initializes the AddProduct controller after root element has been processed.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - Resolves relative paths for root object, or null if location is not known.
      resourceBundle - Resources used to localize root object, or null if root object was not localized.

    • onPartsDeleteButtonClicked

      public void onPartsDeleteButtonClicked(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method deletes selected part, and provides confirmation that part should be deleted.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - actionEvent is initiated by clicking deletePartButton

    • onPartAddClick

      public void onPartAddClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      This method invokes the windowLoader method to take user to AddPart window.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - This actionEvent is triggered by partAddButton.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • onPartsModifyButtonClick

      public void onPartsModifyButtonClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      This method takes the selected part, and sends it to the static 'modifiedPart' field located in ModifyPart controller. This method then uses the windowLoader method to send user to ModifyPart window.

      RUNTIME EXCEPTION - Caught nullptr runtime exception. Used this is catch in other methods as well.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - actionEvent is triggered by clicking modifyPart button.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • onProductAddClick

      public void onProductAddClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      This method invokes windowLoader method to send user to AddProduct window.

      RUNTIME ERROR - Caught runtime error for nullptr.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - actionEvent is triggered by productAddButton.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • onProductModifyButtonClick

      public void onProductModifyButtonClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      This method takes the selected product, and sends it to the static 'modifiedProduct' field located in ModifyProduct controller. This method then uses the windowLoader method to send user to ModifyProduct window.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - actionEvent is triggered by productModifyButton.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • onProductDeleteClick

      public void onProductDeleteClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method deletes selected product. This method has confirmation before deleting.

      LOGIC ERROR - Confirmation Alert was running even if no product was selected. Added new Exception throw for if the productToDelete was null to circumvent this.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - actionEvent is triggered by clicking product delete button.

    • onExitClick

      public void onExitClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Exits application.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - actionEvent is triggered by exitButton.

    • getPartsResultsHandler

      public void getPartsResultsHandler(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method allows users to search for parts in Inventories allParts list, and searches for a parts name (or partial name) and ID.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - This actionEvent is generated by searching (i.e. hitting Return / Enter) in the search bar.

    • getProductsResultsHandler

      public void getProductsResultsHandler(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method allows users to search for products in Inventories allProducts list, and searches for a products name (or partial name) and ID.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - This actionEvent is generated by searching (i.e. hitting Return / Enter) in the search bar.
